channel.title: bayesian statistics on Martin Jung - Environmental and data scientist
channel.description: Recent content in bayesian statistics on Martin Jung - Environmental and data scientist

item.title: Testing multilevel Bayesian models with ordered categorical predictors
item.description: Why argue for Bayesian models? Most researchers and data scientists have specific - domain - knowledge about the subject they analyse data for. In a Bayesian analysis framework this knowledge can be refereed to as Prior and the effect und uncertainty surrounding this. Most standard analytical tools do not account for this information. In fact every statistical tool makes some kind of assumptions about your data. Computers do not now per se how your data looks or what limits it.
